text: Maria ne nzuaim, mba Fhe Bakɨme enser ana ŋgarkarav khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ndu mbarara! Fhe Bakɨme Ŋina Ŋaar ndun han zirgɨrga. Ndu ganɨnga za kha bigi kharav vu guarara ki Fhe Bakɨme won ŋkasŋka bakɨmen ndu vhararga. Fhe Bakɨme maaŋ muuŋgirga. Ndu mba ruagirga tara ŋaar, Fhe Bakɨme kha zɨn anan kamɨnga, nan Kam ma.
